preCopyScript.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_d2b_cmpt_bid_notice_detail
 WHERE dcsno = '@{variables('dcsno')}'
  AND  pblancNo = '@{variables('pblancno')}'
  AND  pblancOdr = '@{variables('pblancodr')}'
  AND  pblancdate = '@{variables('pblancdate')}'
  ;

source.query:
SELECT to_char(now() - interval '1 day','YYYYMMDD') AS DATE
;

SELECT 
  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYY') AS yyyy,
--  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'MM') AS mm,
--  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYY12') AS edt,
  judgeKind
FROM generate_series(
    '2020-01-01'::date,
    date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE),
    interval '1 month'
) dd
CROSS JOIN (
    VALUES 
      ('4304'),
      ('4402'),
      ('9908')
) AS hs(judgeKind)
;

SELECT to_char(now() - interval '1 day','YYYYMMDD') AS DATE
;

SELECT to_char(generate_series(max(c.date)::date + INTERVAL '1 day', now() - INTERVAL '1 day', '1 day')::date,'YYYYMMDD') AS DATE
,A.pum_cd
, A.pum_nm
, A.unit_qty
, A.unit_cd
, B.MARKET
FROM cd_ods.tb_at_auctionitem_qty_distribution_master A,
(SELECT  UNNEST(ARRAY['1','3']) AS MARKET) B,
cd_ods.tb_at_auctionitem_qty_distribution c
GROUP BY A.pum_cd
, A.pum_nm
, A.unit_qty
, A.unit_cd
, B.MARKET
;

select to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'garak' as market
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_intermediary
union
select 
to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'yanggok' as market
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_intermediary
order by date;

(select to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'1' as p_pos_gubun
,'2' as s_pum_nm
union
select 
to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'3' as p_pos_gubun
,'2' as s_pum_nm
union
select to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'1' as p_pos_gubun
,'3' as s_pum_nm
union
select 
to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'3' as p_pos_gubun
,'3' as s_pum_nm
)
order by date;

delete
    from  cd_ods.tb_asos_weather_day
   where tm between '@{pipeline().parameters.StartYM}'
               and '@{pipeline().parameters.EndYM}'

source.query:
SELECT to_char(generate_series(DATE_TRUNC('year', now()) , now() , '1 month')::date,'YYYYMM') AS DATE
;
